Header.Title: USEPA Geospatial Data
Header.Creator: Environmental Protection Agency
Header.Subject: USEPA Geospatial Data
Header.Description: This XML file was produced by US EPA and contains data specifying the locations of EPA regulated facilities or cleanups that are being provided by EPA for use by commercial mapping services and others with an interest in using this information. Updates to this file are produced on a regular basis by EPA and those updates as well as documentation describing the contents of the file can be found at URL:http://www.epa.gov/enviro

Program.ProgramDescription: The Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) is a publicly available EPA database that contains information on toxic chemical releases and other waste management activities reported annually by certain covered industry groups as well as federal facilities.
